Course Overview

Develop communication skills to lead, influence, and inspire.

This masterclass equips leaders and communication professionals with the tools to craft clear, persuasive messages, engage diverse audiences, and present with authority. Participants will learn practical frameworks for storytelling, media engagement, and executive presence, with exercises tailored to science, technology, policy, and innovation sectors.

What You Need

Experience in leadership or communications and a willingness to practice public-facing exercises.

Key Takeaways

Participants will leave with structured messaging frameworks, storytelling techniques, media engagement skills, and enhanced executive presence for high-impact communication.
